features: Installation time is 75% faster: Rolanstar Drawer Dresser adopts a toolless style, which is a new way of assembly and taking a fast installation experience to customers

Large Capacity & Great Storage Experience: The 6 drawers(Dimension of each drawer: 13.8"D x 24.4"W x5.1-8.1"H) provide plenty of storage place to store all your clothes and accessories to keep things neat. Moreover, the 4 foldable dividers that we offer can easily organize your clothes, blankets, underwear, socks, ties, etc
Sturdy Structure: The back of the drawer dresser is equipped with a stabilizing device, which makes the dresser more stable.The 5 solid wood legs provides great stability

User Friendly: The drawers are equipped with premium metal rails and ergonomic handles, which are easily to open and close. The edeg protection of the top surface can prevent things on the surface from falling down. The Non-slip foot pads are designed to keep your dresser stable and prevent your floor from unsightly scratches

Reliable Raw & Multipurpose Usage: Rolanstar chest dresser is made of raw material, which has no peculiar smell and meets the EPA TSCA Title VI and Carb Certification.Besides, this vertical chest of drawers can be used in closets, bedrooms, entryways, and offices

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 6 Drawers Dresser Quick Install With 4 foldable drawer dividers and 6 drawers Rolanstar drawer dresser will offer enough room for you to keep your clothes organized and off the floor! The chest of drawer comes with 4 foldable drawer dividers, keep your folded t-shirts, pants, and pajamas in the 6 spacious drawers with durable metal slides. Simple curved handle pulls add a modern edge to this dresser. The anti-tip kit is included.

With fixture The back of the Drawer dresser is also equipped with a stabilizing device, which makes the dresser more stable and durable. With top edge protection The edge of the top surface can prevent things on the surface from falling down. 4 foldable drawer dividers The 4 foldable drawer dividers, keep your folded t-shirts, pants, and pajamas in the drawers with durable metal slides. Wood Legs 5 wood legs, better to provide great stability and durability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not solid wood, but a solid construction
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what I was looking for. It's cute and fits exactly as described. The hardest part of construction was cleaning up the bits of Styrofoam that flew all over. I built it by myself in about 2 hours. No gluing or drilling needed. I only used the included screwdriver, but a drill on low would have probably made it go a little faster.A comment mentioned the bottoms of the drawers while being a little flimsy, but they are reinforced by a metal bar (I don't see them breaking anytime soon).The only drawback is the gliders. They aren't very smooth (altho quiet), but for the price it is totally expected. They don't stick, it's just that when they are closed you have to give a little extra push so they are flush. I'm sure if they become an issue I could simply install better ones.This is the best piece I've seen for this price point. It isn't wood, it is a type of particle board, but the veneer is nice looking and it doesn't seem like particle board when assembled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy install. Good value. Nice look. After ordering the product (based on its look and star numbers), I came across two negative reviews (defective parts and uneven drawers on right side). I was apprehensive, but after we installed our own dresser (piece of cake, TY), I was relieved to experience none of the two negative comments. Thanks again for a wonderful product. This is our second Rolanstar purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great option for the price.
reviews.reviewText: This dresser was easy to put together. I did it by myself in about an hour. It is pretty sturdy once completed. I needed a cheap by decent looking dresser for my son’s room and this fit the bill. It looks pretty nice in the room. It isn’t high end by any means but I think the quality is good for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, as pictured
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Looks great. And yes it fits a 50 inch. Sturdy enough. Just no TV if you have kids

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality construction and thoughtful design.
reviews.reviewText: I hesitated purchasing a dresser that would have to be assembled, but am thrilled with this purchase! The instructions were easy to follow; my daughter and I put it together in about an hour. The dresser and drawers, although not real wood, are sturdy and thoughtfully designed for a solid finished product. I will be on the lookout for more from this manufacturer and seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for its price
reviews.reviewText: Not bad for its price. It definitely feels flimsy before it’s fully built but after assembly it seems strong enough to support a clothes. Wouldn’t want to support a tv or something more than 50-70 lbs. The color and design feels minimal and Scandinavian without the high price tag. Using this an a baby dresser and it does really well with the included dividers to organize your clothing. Doesn’t seem to have damage. Wouldn’t want to recommend this unless you are patient and smart enough to figure out a puzzle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save your money
reviews.reviewText: This thing was easy to assemble, I will say that, but I wish I would’ve saved my money until I found a higher quality piece. The drawers constantly move out of place and fall out of the rails. They always look crooked and one piece of the railing on one of them broke, so I have to be careful opening it so it won’t smash my fingers. This is so poorly made, please don’t buy this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Quality is better than expected and it was super easy to build
